shortdesc.ph: Pauses media stream forwarding to all destination channels.
Pauses media stream forwarding to all destination channels.
Pauses media stream relay to all destination channels.
Pauses media stream forwarding to all destination channels.

section.p: After starting media stream forwarding across channels, if you need to pause forwarding to all channels, you can call this method. To resume forwarding, call the method.
After starting media stream forwarding across channels, you can call this method to pause forwarding to all channels. To resume forwarding, call the method.
After starting media stream relay across channels, if you want to pause relaying to all destination channels, you can call this method. To resume relaying, call .
After starting to forward media streams across channels, if you need to pause forwarding to all channels, you can call this method. To resume forwarding, call the method.
section.note: You must call this method after calling to start cross-channel media stream forwarding.
You must call this method after calling to start media stream forwarding across channels.
You must call this method after calling to start media stream relay across channels.
You must call this method after calling to start cross-channel media stream forwarding.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: The method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. There is no ongoing cross-channel media stream forwarding.

< 0: The method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. No ongoing cross-channel media stream forwarding exists.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when it fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li:
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-5: This method call was rejected. No cross-channel media stream forwarding is currently in progress.
